ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: The game is still pretty active. I play on Drinal (formally Tarew Marr). Sony is planning a new expansion in November.To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.comFrom:
ygData.messageBody:
The game is still pretty active. I play on Drinal (formally Tarew Marr). Sony is planning a new expansion in November.

To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
From: gollackdeathreaper@...
Date: Thu, 28 Jun 2007 16:04:32 +0000
Subject: [EverQuest] Active servers?

I'm an old EQ player from the Kunark days who left for (shiver) EQ2
then for another MMORG. I'm thinking of making a return to EQ1 as the
bug to play seems to have left for the other game....tooo many kids
and it's becoming a job. I remember many sleepless nights exploring
Norath, Grinding with others on the plains of Karana and actually
enjoying it. Anyone still out there? I've looked at the forum activity
and wasn't very hopeful, but the game looks to be active as far as
current expansions and whatnot.
